00022 #define                 NUM_REVEALED_BYTES                  3200

00024 extern BOOLEAN gfLoadingExitGrids;

00026 BOOLEAN                 gfApplyChangesToTempFile = FALSE;
00027 
00028 //  There are 3200 bytes, and each bit represents the revelaed status.
00029 //    3200 bytes * 8 bits = 25600 map elements
00030 UINT8                   *gpRevealedMap;

00053 
00054 BOOLEAN SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( MODIFY_MAP *pMap, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
00055 {
00056       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00057       HWFILE      hFile;
00058       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
00059 
00060       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
00061 //    GetMapFileName( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, zTempName, FALSE );
00062 
00063       //add the 'm' for 'Modifed Map' to the front of the map name
00064 //    sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\m_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
00065 
00066       GetMapTempFileName( SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ );
00067 
00068       //Open the file for writing, Create it if it doesnt exist
00069       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00070       if( hFile == 0 )
00071       {
00072             //Error opening map modification file
00073             return( FALSE );
00074       }
00075 
00076       //Move to the end of the file
00077       FileSeek( hFile, 0, FILE_SEEK_FROM_END );
00078 
00079 
00080       FileWrite( hFile, pMap, sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00081       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ) )
00082       {
00083             //Error Writing size of array to disk
00084             FileClose( hFile );
00085             return( FALSE );
00086       }
00087 
00088       FileClose( hFile );
00089 
00090       SetSectorFlag( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00091 
00092       return( TRUE );
00093 }

00096 
00097 BOOLEAN LoadAllMapChangesFromMapTempFileAndApplyThem( )
00098 {
00099       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00100       HWFILE      hFile;
00101       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00102       UINT32      uiFileSize;
00103       UINT32      uiNumberOfElements;
00104       UINT32      uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile = 0;    // added becuase if no files get saved back to disk, the flag needs to be erased
00105       UINT32      cnt;
00106       MODIFY_MAP *pMap;
00107       MODIFY_MAP *pTempArrayOfMaps=NULL;
00108       UINT16      usIndex;
00109 
00110       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
00111 //    GetMapFileName( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, zTempName, FALSE );
00112 
00113       //add the 'm' for 'Modifed Map' to the front of the map name
00114 //    sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\m_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
00115 
00116       GetMapTempFileName( SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00117 
00118 
00119       //Check to see if the file exists
00120       if( !FileExists( zMapName ) )
00121       {
00122             //If the file doesnt exists, its no problem.
00123             return( TRUE );
00124       }
00125 
00126       //Open the file for reading
00127       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00128       if( hFile == 0 )
00129       {
00130             //Error opening map modification file,
00131             return( FALSE );
00132       }
00133 
00134 
00135       //Get the size of the file
00136       uiFileSize = FileGetSize( hFile );
00137 
00138 
00139       //Allocate memory for the buffer
00140       pTempArrayOfMaps = (MODIFY_MAP *) MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
00141       if( pTempArrayOfMaps == NULL )
00142       {
00143             Assert( 0 );
00144             return( TRUE );
00145       }
00146 
00147       //Read the map temp file into a buffer
00148       FileRead( hFile, pTempArrayOfMaps, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
00149       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiFileSize )
00150       {
00151             FileClose( hFile );
00152             return( FALSE );
00153       }
00154 
00155       //Close the file
00156       FileClose( hFile );
00157 
00158       //Delete the file
00159       FileDelete( zMapName );
00160 
00161       uiNumberOfElements = uiFileSize / sizeof( MODIFY_MAP );
00162 
00163       for( cnt=0; cnt< uiNumberOfElements; cnt++ )
00164       {
00165             pMap = &pTempArrayOfMaps[ cnt ];
00166 
00167             //Switch on the type that should either be added or removed from the map
00168             switch( pMap->ubType )
00169             {
00170                   //If we are adding to the map
00171                   case SLM_LAND:
00172                         break;
00173                   case SLM_OBJECT:
00174                         GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( pMap->usImageType, pMap->usSubImageIndex, &usIndex );
00175 
00176                         AddObjectFromMapTempFileToMap( pMap->usGridNo, usIndex );
00177 
00178                         // Save this struct back to the temp file
00179                         SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( pMap, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00180 
00181                         //Since the element is being saved back to the temp file, increment the #
00182                         uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile++;
00183 
00184                         break;
00185                   case SLM_STRUCT:
00186                         GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( pMap->usImageType, pMap->usSubImageIndex, &usIndex );
00187 
00188                         AddStructFromMapTempFileToMap( pMap->usGridNo, usIndex );
00189 
00190                         // Save this struct back to the temp file
00191                         SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( pMap, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00192 
00193                         //Since the element is being saved back to the temp file, increment the #
00194                         uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile++;
00195                         break;
00196                   case SLM_SHADOW:
00197                         break;
00198                   case SLM_MERC:
00199                         break;
00200                   case SLM_ROOF:
00201                         break;
00202                   case SLM_ONROOF:
00203                         break;
00204                   case SLM_TOPMOST:
00205                         break;
00206 
00207 
00208                   //Remove objects out of the world
00209                   case SLM_REMOVE_LAND:
00210                         break;
00211                   case SLM_REMOVE_OBJECT:
00212                         break;
00213                   case SLM_REMOVE_STRUCT:
00214 
00215                         // ATE: OK, dor doors, the usIndex can be varied, opened, closed, etc
00216                         // we MUSTR delete ANY door type on this gridno
00217                         // Since we can only have one door per gridno, we're safe to do so.....
00218                         if ( pMap->usImageType >= FIRSTDOOR && pMap->usImageType <= FOURTHDOOR )
00219                         {
00220                               // Remove ANY door...
00221                               RemoveAllStructsOfTypeRange( pMap->usGridNo, FIRSTDOOR, FOURTHDOOR );
00222                         }
00223                         else
00224                         {
00225                               GetTileIndexFromTypeSubIndex( pMap->usImageType, pMap->usSubImageIndex, &usIndex );
00226                               RemoveSavedStructFromMap( pMap->usGridNo, usIndex );
00227                         }
00228 
00229                         // Save this struct back to the temp file
00230                         SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( pMap, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00231 
00232                         //Since the element is being saved back to the temp file, increment the #
00233                         uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile++;
00234                         break;
00235                   case SLM_REMOVE_SHADOW:
00236                         break;
00237                   case SLM_REMOVE_MERC:
00238                         break;
00239                   case SLM_REMOVE_ROOF:
00240                         break;
00241                   case SLM_REMOVE_ONROOF:
00242                         break;
00243                   case SLM_REMOVE_TOPMOST:
00244                         break;
00245 
00246 
00247                   case SLM_BLOOD_SMELL:
00248                         AddBloodOrSmellFromMapTempFileToMap( pMap );
00249                         break;
00250 
00251                   case SLM_DAMAGED_STRUCT:
00252                         DamageStructsFromMapTempFile( pMap );
00253                         break;
00254 
00255                   case SLM_EXIT_GRIDS:
00256                         {
00257                               EXITGRID ExitGrid;
00258                               gfLoadingExitGrids = TRUE;
00259                               ExitGrid.usGridNo = pMap->usSubImageIndex;
00260                               ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorX = (UINT8) pMap->usImageType;
00261                               ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorY = (UINT8) ( pMap->usImageType >> 8 ) ;
00262                               ExitGrid.ubGotoSectorZ = pMap->ubExtra;
00263 
00264                               AddExitGridToWorld( pMap->usGridNo, &ExitGrid );
00265                               gfLoadingExitGrids = FALSE;
00266 
00267                               // Save this struct back to the temp file
00268                               SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( pMap, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00269 
00270                               //Since the element is being saved back to the temp file, increment the #
00271                               uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile++;
00272                         }
00273                         break;
00274 
00275                   case SLM_OPENABLE_STRUCT:
00276                         SetOpenableStructStatusFromMapTempFile( pMap->usGridNo, (BOOLEAN)pMap->usImageType );
00277                         break;
00278 
00279                   case SLM_WINDOW_HIT:
00280                         if ( ModifyWindowStatus( pMap->usGridNo ) )
00281                         {
00282                               // Save this struct back to the temp file
00283                               SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( pMap, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00284 
00285                               //Since the element is being saved back to the temp file, increment the #
00286                               uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile++;
00287                         }
00288                         break;
00289 
00290                   default:
00291                         AssertMsg( 0, "ERROR!  Map Type not in switch when loading map changes from temp file");
00292                         break;
00293             }
00294 
00295       }
00296 
00297       //if no elements are saved back to the file, remove the flag indicating that there is a temp file
00298       if( uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile == 0 )
00299       {
00300             ReSetSectorFlag( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00301       }
00302 
00303       FileClose( hFile );
00304 
00305       //Free the memory used for the temp array
00306       MemFree( pTempArrayOfMaps );
00307       pTempArrayOfMaps = NULL;
00308       
00309       return( TRUE );
00310 }

00318 
00319 void AddStructToMapTempFile( UINT32 uiMapIndex, UINT16 usIndex )
00320 {
00321       MODIFY_MAP Map;
00322       UINT32      uiType;
00323       UINT16      usSubIndex;
00324 
00325 
00326       if( !gfApplyChangesToTempFile )
00327             return;
00328 
00329       if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
00330             return;
00331 
00332       GetTileType( usIndex, &uiType );
00333       GetSubIndexFromTileIndex( usIndex, &usSubIndex );
00334 
00335       memset( &Map, 0, sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ) );
00336 
00337       Map.usGridNo = (UINT16)uiMapIndex;
00338 //    Map.usIndex       = usIndex;
00339       Map.usImageType = (UINT16)uiType;
00340       Map.usSubImageIndex = usSubIndex;
00341 
00342       Map.ubType        = SLM_STRUCT;
00343 
00344       SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( &Map, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00345 }

00415 void RemoveStructFromMapTempFile( UINT32 uiMapIndex, UINT16 usIndex )
00416 {
00417       MODIFY_MAP Map;
00418       UINT32      uiType;
00419       UINT16      usSubIndex;
00420 
00421       if( !gfApplyChangesToTempFile )
00422             return;
00423 
00424       if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
00425             return;
00426 
00427       GetTileType( usIndex, &uiType );
00428       GetSubIndexFromTileIndex( usIndex, &usSubIndex );
00429 
00430       memset( &Map, 0, sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ) );
00431 
00432       Map.usGridNo      = (UINT16)uiMapIndex;
00433 //    Map.usIndex             = usIndex;
00434       Map.usImageType = (UINT16)uiType;
00435       Map.usSubImageIndex = usSubIndex;
00436 
00437       Map.ubType              = SLM_REMOVE_STRUCT;
00438 
00439       SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( &Map, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00440 
00441 }

00451 
00452 void SaveBloodSmellAndRevealedStatesFromMapToTempFile()
00453 {
00454       MODIFY_MAP Map;
00455       UINT16      cnt;
00456       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
00457 
00458 
00459       gpRevealedMap = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( NUM_REVEALED_BYTES );
00460       if( gpRevealedMap == NULL )
00461             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed allocating memory for the revealed map" );
00462       memset( gpRevealedMap, 0, NUM_REVEALED_BYTES );
00463 
00464       //Loop though all the map elements
00465       for ( cnt = 0; cnt < WORLD_MAX; cnt++ )
00466       {
00467             //if there is either blood or a smell on the tile, save it
00468             if( gpWorldLevelData[cnt].ubBloodInfo || gpWorldLevelData[cnt].ubSmellInfo )
00469             {
00470                   memset( &Map, 0, sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ) );
00471 
00472 
00473                   // Save the BloodInfo in the bottom byte and the smell info in the upper byte
00474                   Map.usGridNo      = cnt;
00475 //                Map.usIndex             = gpWorldLevelData[cnt].ubBloodInfo | ( gpWorldLevelData[cnt].ubSmellInfo << 8 );
00476                   Map.usImageType = gpWorldLevelData[cnt].ubBloodInfo;
00477                   Map.usSubImageIndex = gpWorldLevelData[cnt].ubSmellInfo;
00478 
00479 
00480                   Map.ubType              = SLM_BLOOD_SMELL;
00481 
00482                   //Save the change to the map file
00483                   SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( &Map, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00484             }
00485 
00486 
00487             //if the element has been revealed
00488             if( gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED )
00489             {
00490                   SetSectorsRevealedBit( cnt );
00491             }
00492 
00493             //if there is a structure that is damaged
00494             if( gpWorldLevelData[cnt].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_STRUCTURE_DAMAGED )
00495             {
00496                   STRUCTURE * pCurrent;
00497 
00498                   pCurrent =  gpWorldLevelData[cnt].pStructureHead;
00499 
00500                   pCurrent = FindStructure( cnt, STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE );
00501 
00502                   //loop through all the structures and add all that are damaged
00503                   while( pCurrent )
00504                   {
00505                         //if the structure has been damaged
00506                         if( pCurrent->ubHitPoints < pCurrent->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubHitPoints )
00507                         {
00508                               UINT8 ubBitToSet = 0x80;
00509                               UINT8 ubLevel=0;
00510 
00511                               if( pCurrent->sCubeOffset != 0 )
00512                                     ubLevel |= ubBitToSet;
00513 
00514                               memset( &Map, 0, sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ) );
00515 
00516                               // Save the Damaged value
00517                               Map.usGridNo      = cnt;
00518 //                            Map.usIndex             = StructureFlagToType( pCurrent->fFlags ) | ( pCurrent->ubHitPoints << 8 );
00519                               Map.usImageType = StructureFlagToType( pCurrent->fFlags );
00520                               Map.usSubImageIndex = pCurrent->ubHitPoints;
00521 
00522 
00523                               Map.ubType              = SLM_DAMAGED_STRUCT;
00524                               Map.ubExtra             = pCurrent->ubWallOrientation | ubLevel;
00525 
00526                               //Save the change to the map file
00527                               SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( &Map, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00528                         }
00529 
00530                         pCurrent = FindNextStructure( pCurrent, STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE );
00531                   }
00532             }
00533 
00534             pStructure = FindStructure( cnt, STRUCTURE_OPENABLE );
00535 
00536             //if this structure
00537             if( pStructure )
00538             {
00539                   // if the current structure has an openable structure in it, and it is NOT a door
00540                   if( !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYDOOR ) )
00541                   {
00542                         BOOLEAN                 fStatusOnTheMap;
00543 
00544                         fStatusOnTheMap = ( ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN ) != 0 );
00545 
00546                         AddOpenableStructStatusToMapTempFile( cnt, fStatusOnTheMap );
00547                   }
00548             }
00549       }
00550 }
00551 
00552 
00553 // The BloodInfo is saved in the bottom byte and the smell info in the upper byte
00554 void AddBloodOrSmellFromMapTempFileToMap( MODIFY_MAP *pMap )
00555 {
00556       gpWorldLevelData[ pMap->usGridNo ].ubBloodInfo = (UINT8)pMap->usImageType;
00557 
00558       //if the blood and gore option IS set, add blood
00559       if( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_BLOOD_N_GORE ] )
00560       {
00561             // Update graphics for both levels...
00562             gpWorldLevelData[ pMap->usGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATEBLOOD;
00563             UpdateBloodGraphics( pMap->usGridNo, 0 );
00564             gpWorldLevelData[ pMap->usGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REEVALUATEBLOOD;
00565             UpdateBloodGraphics( pMap->usGridNo, 1 );
00566       }
00567 
00568       gpWorldLevelData[ pMap->usGridNo ].ubSmellInfo = (UINT8)pMap->usSubImageIndex;
00569 }

00572 
00573 BOOLEAN SaveRevealedStatusArrayToRevealedTempFile( INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ )
00574 {
00575       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00576       HWFILE      hFile;
00577       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
00578 
00579       Assert( gpRevealedMap != NULL );
00580 
00581       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
00582 //    GetMapFileName( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, zTempName, FALSE );
00583 
00584       //add the 'v' for 'reVeiled Map' to the front of the map name
00585 //    sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\v_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
00586 
00587       GetMapTempFileName( SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ );
00588 
00589 
00590       //Open the file for writing, Create it if it doesnt exist
00591       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
00592       if( hFile == 0 )
00593       {
00594             //Error opening map modification file
00595             return( FALSE );
00596       }
00597 
00598 
00599       //Write the revealed array to the Revealed temp file
00600       FileWrite( hFile, gpRevealedMap, NUM_REVEALED_BYTES, &uiNumBytesWritten );
00601       if( uiNumBytesWritten != NUM_REVEALED_BYTES )
00602       {
00603             //Error Writing size of array to disk
00604             FileClose( hFile );
00605             return( FALSE );
00606       }
00607 
00608       FileClose( hFile );
00609 
00610       SetSectorFlag( sSectorX, sSectorY, bSectorZ, SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS );
00611 
00612       MemFree( gpRevealedMap );
00613       gpRevealedMap = NULL;
00614 
00615       return( TRUE );
00616 }

00620 
00621 BOOLEAN LoadRevealedStatusArrayFromRevealedTempFile()
00622 {
00623       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00624       HWFILE      hFile;
00625       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00626 
00627 
00628 
00629       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
00630 //    GetMapFileName( gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ, zTempName, FALSE );
00631 
00632       //add the 'v' for 'reVeiled Map' to the front of the map name
00633 //    sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\v_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
00634 
00635       GetMapTempFileName( SF_REVEALED_STATUS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, gWorldSectorX, gWorldSectorY, gbWorldSectorZ );
00636 
00637       //Check to see if the file exists
00638       if( !FileExists( zMapName ) )
00639       {
00640             //If the file doesnt exists, its no problem.
00641             return( TRUE );
00642       }
00643 
00644       //Open the file for reading
00645       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00646       if( hFile == 0 )
00647       {
00648             //Error opening map modification file,
00649             return( FALSE );
00650       }
00651 
00652       //Allocate memory
00653       Assert( gpRevealedMap == NULL );
00654       gpRevealedMap = (UINT8 *) MemAlloc( NUM_REVEALED_BYTES );
00655       if( gpRevealedMap == NULL )
00656             AssertMsg( 0, "Failed allocating memory for the revealed map" );
00657       memset( gpRevealedMap, 0, NUM_REVEALED_BYTES );
00658 
00659 
00660 
00661       // Load the Reveal map array structure
00662       FileRead( hFile, gpRevealedMap, NUM_REVEALED_BYTES, &uiNumBytesRead );
00663       if( uiNumBytesRead != NUM_REVEALED_BYTES )
00664       {
00665             return( FALSE );
00666       }
00667 
00668       FileClose( hFile );
00669 
00670 
00671       //Loop through and set the bits in the map that are revealed
00672       SetMapRevealedStatus();
00673       
00674       MemFree( gpRevealedMap );
00675       gpRevealedMap = NULL;
00676 
00677 
00678 
00679       return( TRUE );
00680 }
00681 
00682 void SetSectorsRevealedBit( UINT16  usMapIndex )
00683 {
00684       UINT16      usByteNumber;
00685       UINT8       ubBitNumber;
00686 
00687       usByteNumber = usMapIndex / 8;
00688       ubBitNumber  = usMapIndex % 8;
00689 
00690       gpRevealedMap[ usByteNumber ] |= 1 << ubBitNumber;
00691 }
00692 
00693 
00694 
00695 void SetMapRevealedStatus()
00696 {
00697       UINT16      usByteCnt;
00698       UINT8       ubBitCnt;
00699       UINT16      usMapIndex;
00700 
00701       if( gpRevealedMap == NULL )
00702             AssertMsg( 0, "gpRevealedMap is NULL.  DF 1" );
00703 
00704 
00705       ClearSlantRoofs( );
00706 
00707       //Loop through all bytes in the array
00708       for( usByteCnt=0; usByteCnt< 3200; usByteCnt++)
00709       {
00710             //loop through all the bits in the byte
00711             for( ubBitCnt=0; ubBitCnt<8; ubBitCnt++)
00712             {
00713                   usMapIndex = ( usByteCnt * 8 ) + ubBitCnt;
00714 
00715                   if( gpRevealedMap[ usByteCnt ] & ( 1 << ubBitCnt ) )
00716                   {
00717                         gpWorldLevelData[ usMapIndex ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_REVEALED;
00718                         SetGridNoRevealedFlag( usMapIndex );
00719                   }
00720                   else
00721                   {
00722                         gpWorldLevelData[ usMapIndex ].uiFlags &= (~MAPELEMENT_REVEALED );
00723                   }
00724             }
00725       }
00726 
00727       ExamineSlantRoofFOVSlots( );
00728 
00729 }
00730 
00731 
00732 
00733 
00734 void DamageStructsFromMapTempFile( MODIFY_MAP * pMap )
00735 {
00736       STRUCTURE *pCurrent=NULL;
00737       INT8              bLevel;
00738       UINT8             ubWallOrientation;
00739       UINT8             ubBitToSet = 0x80;
00740       UINT8             ubHitPoints=0;
00741       UINT8             ubType=0;
00742 
00743 
00744       //Find the base structure
00745       pCurrent = FindStructure( (INT16)pMap->usGridNo, STRUCTURE_BASE_TILE );
00746 
00747       if( pCurrent == NULL )
00748             return;
00749 
00750       bLevel = pMap->ubExtra & ubBitToSet;
00751       ubWallOrientation = pMap->ubExtra & ~ubBitToSet;
00752       ubType = (UINT8) pMap->usImageType;
00753 
00754 
00755       //Check to see if the desired strucure node is in this tile
00756       pCurrent = FindStructureBySavedInfo( pMap->usGridNo, ubType, ubWallOrientation, bLevel );
00757 
00758       if( pCurrent != NULL )
00759       {
00760             //Assign the hitpoints
00761             pCurrent->ubHitPoints = (UINT8)( pMap->usSubImageIndex );
00762 
00763             gpWorldLevelData[ pCurrent->sGridNo ].uiFlags |= MAPELEMENT_STRUCTURE_DAMAGED;
00764       }
00765 }

00771 void AddStructToUnLoadedMapTempFile( UINT32 uiMapIndex, UINT16 usIndex, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ  )

00778             return;

00781       GetSubIndexFromTileIndex( usIndex, &usSubIndex );
00782 
00783       memset( &Map, 0, sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ) );
00784 
00785       Map.usGridNo = (UINT16)uiMapIndex;
00786 //    Map.usIndex       = usIndex;
00787       Map.usImageType = (UINT16)uiType;
00788       Map.usSubImageIndex = usSubIndex;
00789 
00790 
00791       Map.ubType        = SLM_STRUCT;
00792 
00793       SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( &Map, sSectorX, sSectorY, ubSectorZ );
00794 }

00871 void AddExitGridToMapTempFile( UINT16 usGridNo, EXITGRID *pExitGrid, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ )
00872 {
00873       MODIFY_MAP Map;
00874 
00875       if( !gfApplyChangesToTempFile )
00876       {
00877             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"Called AddExitGridToMapTempFile() without calling ApplyMapChangesToMapTempFile()" );
00878             return;
00879       }
00880 
00881       if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & LOADING_SAVED_GAME )
00882             return;
00883 
00884       memset( &Map, 0, sizeof( MODIFY_MAP ) );
00885 
00886       Map.usGridNo = usGridNo;
00887 //    Map.usIndex       = pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorX;
00888 
00889       Map.usImageType = pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorX | ( pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorY << 8 );
00890       Map.usSubImageIndex = pExitGrid->usGridNo;
00891 
00892       Map.ubExtra       = pExitGrid->ubGotoSectorZ;
00893       Map.ubType        = SLM_EXIT_GRIDS;
00894 
00895       SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( &Map, sSectorX, sSectorY, ubSectorZ );
00896 }
00897 
00898 BOOLEAN RemoveGraphicFromTempFile( UINT32 uiMapIndex, UINT16 usIndex, INT16 sSectorX, INT16 sSectorY, UINT8 ubSectorZ )
00899 {
00900       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
00901       HWFILE      hFile;
00902       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00903       MODIFY_MAP *pTempArrayOfMaps=NULL;
00904       MODIFY_MAP *pMap;
00905       UINT32      uiFileSize;
00906       UINT32      uiNumberOfElements;
00907       BOOLEAN     fRetVal=FALSE;
00908       UINT32      uiType;
00909       UINT16      usSubIndex;
00910       UINT32      cnt;
00911 
00912 
00913       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
00914 //    GetMapFileName( sSectorX, sSectorY, ubSectorZ, zTempName, FALSE );
00915 
00916       //add the 'm' for 'Modifed Map' to the front of the map name
00917 //    sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\m_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
00918 
00919       GetMapTempFileName( SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, sSectorX, sSectorY, ubSectorZ );
00920 
00921       //Check to see if the file exists
00922       if( !FileExists( zMapName ) )
00923       {
00924             //If the file doesnt exists, 
00925             return( FALSE );
00926       }
00927 
00928 
00929       //Open the file for writing, Create it if it doesnt exist
00930       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
00931       if( hFile == 0 )
00932       {
00933             //Error opening map modification file
00934             return( FALSE );
00935       }
00936 
00937       //Get the size of the temp file
00938       uiFileSize = FileGetSize( hFile );
00939 
00940       //Allocate memory for the buffer
00941       pTempArrayOfMaps = (MODIFY_MAP *) MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
00942       if( pTempArrayOfMaps == NULL )
00943       {
00944             Assert( 0 );
00945             return( FALSE );
00946       }
00947 
00948       //Read the map temp file into a buffer
00949       FileRead( hFile, pTempArrayOfMaps, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
00950       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiFileSize )
00951       {
00952             FileClose( hFile );
00953             return( FALSE );
00954       }
00955 
00956       //Close the file
00957       FileClose( hFile );
00958 
00959       //Delete the file
00960       FileDelete( zMapName );
00961 
00962       //Get the number of elements in the file
00963       uiNumberOfElements = uiFileSize / sizeof( MODIFY_MAP );
00964 
00965       //Get the image type and subindex
00966       GetTileType( usIndex, &uiType );
00967       GetSubIndexFromTileIndex( usIndex, &usSubIndex );
00968 
00969       for( cnt=0; cnt< uiNumberOfElements; cnt++ )
00970       {
00971             pMap = &pTempArrayOfMaps[ cnt ];
00972 
00973             //if this is the peice we are looking for
00974             if( pMap->usGridNo == uiMapIndex && pMap->usImageType == uiType && pMap->usSubImageIndex == usSubIndex )
00975             {
00976                   //Do nothin
00977                   fRetVal = TRUE;
00978             }
00979             else
00980             {
00981                   //save the struct back to the temp file
00982                   SaveModifiedMapStructToMapTempFile( pMap, sSectorX, sSectorY, ubSectorZ );
00983             }
00984       }
00985 
00986       return( fRetVal );
00987 }

01016 
01017 BOOLEAN ModifyWindowStatus( UINT32 uiMapIndex )
01018 {
01019       STRUCTURE *       pStructure;
01020 
01021       pStructure = FindStructure( (INT16) uiMapIndex, STRUCTURE_WALLNWINDOW );
01022       if (pStructure)
01023       {
01024             SwapStructureForPartner( (INT16) uiMapIndex, pStructure );        
01025             return( TRUE );
01026       }
01027       // else forget it, window could be destroyed
01028       return( FALSE );
01029 }
01030 
01031 void SetOpenableStructStatusFromMapTempFile( UINT32 uiMapIndex, BOOLEAN fOpened )
01032 {
01033       STRUCTURE * pStructure;
01034       STRUCTURE * pBase;
01035       BOOLEAN                 fStatusOnTheMap;
01036       ITEM_POOL               *pItemPool;
01037   INT16     sBaseGridNo = (INT16)uiMapIndex;
01038 
01039       pStructure = FindStructure( (UINT16)uiMapIndex, STRUCTURE_OPENABLE );
01040 
01041       if( pStructure == NULL )
01042       {
01043 //          ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MSG_BETAVERSION, L"SetOpenableStructStatusFromMapTempFile( %d, %d ) failed to find the openable struct.  DF 1.", uiMapIndex, fOpened );
01044             return;
01045       }
01046 
01047       fStatusOnTheMap = ( ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN ) != 0 );
01048 
01049       if( fStatusOnTheMap != fOpened )
01050       {
01051             // Adjust the item's gridno to the base of struct.....
01052             pBase = FindBaseStructure( pStructure );
01053             
01054             // Get LEVELNODE for struct and remove!
01055     if ( pBase )
01056     {
01057               sBaseGridNo = pBase->sGridNo;
01058     }
01059 
01060             if(SwapStructureForPartnerWithoutTriggeringSwitches( (UINT16)uiMapIndex, pStructure ) == NULL )
01061             {
01062                   //an error occured
01063             }
01064 
01065 
01066             // Adjust visiblity of any item pools here....
01067     // ATE: Nasty bug here - use base gridno for structure for items!
01068     // since items always drop to base gridno in AddItemToPool
01069             if ( GetItemPool( sBaseGridNo, &pItemPool, 0 ) )
01070             {
01071                   if ( fOpened )
01072                   {
01073                          // We are open, make un-hidden if so....
01074                          SetItemPoolVisibilityOn( pItemPool, ANY_VISIBILITY_VALUE, FALSE );
01075                   }
01076                   else
01077                   {
01078                          // Make sure items are hidden...
01079                          SetItemPoolVisibilityHidden( pItemPool );
01080                   }
01081 
01082             }
01083 
01084       }
01085 }

01089 
01090 BOOLEAN ChangeStatusOfOpenableStructInUnloadedSector( UINT16 usSectorX, UINT16 usSectorY, INT8 bSectorZ, UINT16 usGridNo, BOOLEAN fChangeToOpen )
01091 {
01092 //    STRUCTURE * pStructure;
01093 //    MODIFY_MAP Map;
01094       CHAR8       zMapName[ 128 ];
01095       HWFILE      hFile;
01096       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
01097       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten;
01098       UINT32      uiFileSize;
01099       UINT32      uiNumberOfElements;
01100       UINT32      uiNumberOfElementsSavedBackToFile = 0;    // added becuase if no files get saved back to disk, the flag needs to be erased
01101       UINT32      cnt;
01102       MODIFY_MAP *pMap;
01103       MODIFY_MAP *pTempArrayOfMaps=NULL;
01104 //    UINT16      usIndex;
01105 
01106 
01107       //Convert the current sector location into a file name
01108 //    GetMapFileName( usSectorX, usSectorY, bSectorZ, zTempName, FALSE );
01109 
01110       //add the 'm' for 'Modifed Map' to the front of the map name
01111 //    sprintf( zMapName, "%s\\m_%s", MAPS_DIR, zTempName);
01112 
01113       GetMapTempFileName( SF_MAP_MODIFICATIONS_TEMP_FILE_EXISTS, zMapName, usSectorX, usSectorY, bSectorZ );
01114 
01115       //Check to see if the file exists
01116       if( !FileExists( zMapName ) )
01117       {
01118             //If the file doesnt exists, its no problem.
01119             return( TRUE );
01120       }
01121 
01122       //Open the file for reading
01123       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_READ | FILE_OPEN_EXISTING, FALSE );
01124       if( hFile == 0 )
01125       {
01126             //Error opening map modification file,
01127             return( FALSE );
01128       }
01129 
01130       //Get the size of the file
01131       uiFileSize = FileGetSize( hFile );
01132 
01133 
01134       //Allocate memory for the buffer
01135       pTempArrayOfMaps = (MODIFY_MAP *) MemAlloc( uiFileSize );
01136       if( pTempArrayOfMaps == NULL )
01137       {
01138             Assert( 0 );
01139             return( TRUE );
01140       }
01141 
01142       //Read the map temp file into a buffer
01143       FileRead( hFile, pTempArrayOfMaps, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesRead );
01144       if( uiNumBytesRead != uiFileSize )
01145       {
01146             FileClose( hFile );
01147             return( FALSE );
01148       }
01149 
01150       //Close the file
01151       FileClose( hFile );
01152 
01153       //Delete the file
01154       FileDelete( zMapName );
01155 
01156       uiNumberOfElements = uiFileSize / sizeof( MODIFY_MAP );
01157 
01158       //loop through all the array elements to 
01159       for( cnt=0; cnt< uiNumberOfElements; cnt++ )
01160       {
01161             pMap = &pTempArrayOfMaps[ cnt ];
01162 
01163             //if this element is of the same type
01164             if( pMap->ubType == SLM_OPENABLE_STRUCT )
01165             {
01166                   //if its on the same gridno
01167                   if( pMap->usGridNo == usGridNo )
01168                   {
01169                         //Change to the desired settings
01170                         pMap->usImageType = fChangeToOpen;
01171 
01172                         break;
01173                   }
01174             }
01175       }
01176 
01177       //Open the file for writing
01178       hFile = FileOpen( zMapName, FILE_ACCESS_WRITE | FILE_OPEN_ALWAYS, FALSE );
01179       if( hFile == 0 )
01180       {
01181             //Error opening map modification file,
01182             return( FALSE );
01183       }
01184 
01185       //Write the map temp file into a buffer
01186       FileWrite( hFile, pTempArrayOfMaps, uiFileSize, &uiNumBytesWritten );
01187       if( uiNumBytesWritten != uiFileSize )
01188       {
01189             FileClose( hFile );
01190             return( FALSE );
01191       }
01192 
01193       FileClose( hFile );
01194 
01195       return( TRUE );
01196 }
